brand.name: Otherwhere
brand.tagline: Personal travel booking service. Text or call to get flights and hotels booked for you.

snippets.short: Otherwhere: Text or call to get flights and hotels booked for you.
snippets.medium: Otherwhere is a personal travel booking service. Text or call with where you want to go, and we'll find curated flight and hotel options—then book everything for you.
snippets.full: Otherwhere is a personal travel booking service. Text or call with where you want to go, and we'll search real inventory through Duffel's API. You get 3-5 curated options with actual prices. Pick one, pay through a secure link, and we handle the entire booking. You receive confirmation numbers, PNRs, and e-tickets directly. No searching, no checkout forms—just confirmations. Built for people who'd rather text than browse 47 tabs.

pillars.name: The ChatGPT Travel Problem
pillars.angle: ChatGPT is great for brainstorming but can't book, verify prices, or remember you. Purpose-built travel AI can.

pillars.name: The Paradox of Choice
pillars.angle: Travel has too many options. More choice = more stress. You need curation, not search results.

pillars.name: The New Concierge
pillars.angle: Personal service meets modern technology. Text-first, real inventory, actual booking. No apps, no endless searching.

pillars.name: Time Over Money
pillars.angle: For people who have money but not time, the math changes. Your time is worth more than the 'savings' from 3 hours of research.

pillars.name: Curated, Not Comprehensive
pillars.angle: Not '50 hotels in Paris' but 'The 3 hotels in Paris for different types of travelers.' Opinionated, specific, useful.

pillars.name: Understated Luxury
pillars.angle: Luxury isn't marble lobbies and gold leaf. It's the quiet wine bar the concierge knows.

skip-the-prompts.headline: Skip the Search
skip-the-prompts.body: Text us at (323) 922-4067 with where you want to go. We'll send curated options and book for you.

try-otherwhere.headline: Ready to Book Your Trip?
try-otherwhere.body: Text us at (323) 922-4067 and tell us where you want to go. We'll find options, then handle the entire booking for you.

personalized-recs.headline: Want Curated Options?
personalized-recs.body: Text us at (323) 922-4067 with your trip details. We'll send 3-5 options matched to your preferences, with real prices.

stop-researching.headline: Stop Searching. Start Texting.
stop-researching.body: Your time is worth more than endless tabs. Text us at (323) 922-4067—we'll search, you'll pick, we'll book.

soft-curious.headline: Curious How It Works?
soft-curious.body: Text us at (323) 922-4067 and say where you want to go. We'll send options. You pick. We book. No commitment to start.

writingGuidelines.voice: Write like a well-traveled friend, not a marketing bot. Opinionated but not snobby. Specific details over generic advice.
writingGuidelines.structure: Answer the search intent in first 100 words. Use short paragraphs (2-3 sentences). Include specific examples and numbers.
